content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
  - Fuel: 4 units of coal
  - Status: No ingredients to smelt
  - Current energy: 1600.0
  - Warnings: No ingredients to smelt

### Copper Plate Smelting Facility at Position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
  - Fuel: 4 units of coal
  - Status: Working
  - Current energy: 1600.0
  - Furnace source: 1 unit of copper ore
  - Furnace result: 10 copper plates

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it on the map.

### Errors when extracting items from a furnace with no valid entity
- Verify that the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.

### Errors due to insufficient resources for crafting
- Check your inventory to ensure you have all necessary resources before attempting to craft an item. If not, gather more resources.

### Errors when crafting sub-ingredients
- When crafting complex items, ensure that all sub-ingredients are available and that the crafting process is compatible with the available machines or methods.
